title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Sales in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Sales in million U.S. dollars is gradually increasing from 2011 to 2012, rapidly constant from 2012 to 2017, and lastly gradually decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Max Sales in million U.S. dollars about 436.56 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Sales in million U.S. dollars about 168.8 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2017.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
